name: Count Justinian Moustache Wax Iconic T-Shirt
description:
Now you can show off your allegiance, or just your great taste, with a brand new, stylish Count Justinian Moustache Wax T-Shirt!

Our T-Shirts are high quality, Gildan 6.1 oz. 100% cotton "Ultra Cotton" preshrunk shirts, featuring an ultratight knit surface, a seamless double-needle collar, taped neck and shoulders, and double-needle sleeve and bottom hems, and they are quarter-turned to eliminate any center crease.  These T-Shirts are Black with White screen printing on the front and solid Black in the back.

Count Justinian Moustache Wax is available separately in two styles, Classic and Sticky as Hell!!!  This listing is for our iconic T-Shirts only -- please see our other listings to order our moustache wax.

For all our moustachewaxery, be sure to follow us on Twitter at @CJMoustacheWax and "Like" us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/CountJustinianMoustacheWax.

A Moustache is ICONIC, not Ironic!

name: Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Sticky as Hell!!!)
description:
You are purchasing a 1 oz. tin of extra firm Sticky as Hell!!! moustache wax by Count Justinian Moustache Wax.  Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Sticky as Hell!!!) is great for both simple maintenance of ordinary moustaches and turning up handlebars, and it also provides a very firm all-day hold for longer or more tightly curled handlebars and more gravity-defying styles.  If you are looking for a very stiff moustache wax, try Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Sticky as Hell!!!).

If you prefer a more classic, softer moustache wax that still provides great all-day hold, check out our separate listing for Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Classic).  Our Classic moustache wax strikes a great balance between the hold of a traditional moustache wax and the easy workability of a moustache cream.

For all our moustachewaxery, be sure to follow us on Twitter at @CJMoustacheWax and "Like" us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/CountJustinianMoustacheWax.

A Moustache is ICONIC, not Ironic!

name: Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Classic)
description:
You are purchasing a 1 oz. tin of Classic style Count Justinian Moustache Wax.  Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Classic) is perfect for both simple maintenance of ordinary moustaches as well as sculpting turned up handlebars and other more elaborate styles.  And, it's great for keeping scraggly beards and sideburns in check too.  We believe Count Justinian Moustache Wax (Classic) strikes a great balance between the hold of a traditional moustache wax and the easy workability of a moustache cream.  We are confident you will agree.

If you prefer a stiff moustache wax, check out our separate listing for Count Justinian Moustache Wax - Sticky as Hell!!!  Our stiffer wax is, as the name suggests, sticky as hell, and is ideal for longer or more tightly curled handlebars and other more gravity-defying styles.

For all our moustachewaxery, be sure to follow us on Twitter at @CJMoustacheWax and "Like" us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/CountJustinianMoustacheWax.

A Moustache is ICONIC, not Ironic!
